NPC.name: Arachne
NPC.description: A creature of contrasts and menacing power. The arachne is a volumptous dark skinned woman from the waist up, bared breasts on proud display and framed by the errant locks of her platinum blonde hair that flows untamed to midback in length. While from the waist down she is an arachnid, six legs carrying a thorax and abdomen through the darkness.Glistening hints of silvery highlights visible on the coal black exoskeleton of her tauric half. As if sensing herself under observation she glides a hand down beneath the join, brushing it over a moist and hungering gash.
